channel.title: Client Magic Speed
channel.description:
I have found out how to use magics, or alteast send the graphic command to the client and client shows it... but my magic kinda moves like 1 pixel/3second or something like that, anyone knows the client side class/method/sendframe id for sending or changing the speed of the magic moving to it's destination?
Thanks already, WhiteFang
